name: BushiDuo
description:
My entry to Godot WildJam 24 for the theme : Family, Wildcard : Secret Passage

Play as a Brother/SIster ninja duo, you attack the deadly fortress of the Shadow clan Ninjas

Basic Controls :

Keyboard :

Arrowkeys to move, Ctrl or Tab to attack, Spacebar to jump, Esc to switch Characters anytime.

Controller :

Dpad to move,X to attack,A to jump, B to switch Characters anytime.

Control Notes :

You can slide by pressing down and jump, this gives you some I Frames to help traversing hazzards and dodging attacks.
